io.dataplay.storm.workers

Interface IDataWorker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBolt, LoggingBolt, MergeBolt

    public interface IDataWorker
    This is the base interface to which all spouts and bolts in our library must adhere. Its intent is to expose methods by which a spout/bolt may be asked to determine whether its configuration is valid.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateFields()
      This method asks an instance to determine its emitted schema.
      void calculateFields(backtype.storm.tuple.Fields parentSchema)
      This method asks an instance to determine its EMITTED schema based on a single parent schema.
      void calculateFields(List<backtype.storm.tuple.Fields> parentSchema)
      This method asks an instance to determine its EMITTED schema based on a collection of parent schemas.
      backtype.storm.tuple.Fields getFields()
      Get the fields schema.
      Boolean isValid()
      This method reveals whether the present configuration of this worker is valid.
      void setFields(backtype.storm.tuple.Fields fields)
      Set the fields Schema.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        Boolean isValid()
        This method reveals whether the present configuration of this worker is valid.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration is valid, otherwise False.

      • calculateFields

        void calculateFields()
        This method asks an instance to determine its emitted schema.

      • calculateFields

        void calculateFields(List<backtype.storm.tuple.Fields> parentSchema)
        This method asks an instance to determine its EMITTED schema based on a collection of parent schemas. This method can be used if we know the bolt in question has multiple parents in the topology.
        Parameters:
        parentSchema - A list of parent schemae, describing the format of tuples which this worker should expect to receive.

      • calculateFields

        void calculateFields(backtype.storm.tuple.Fields parentSchema)
        This method asks an instance to determine its EMITTED schema based on a single parent schema. This method can be used if we know the bolt in question only has one parent in the topology.
        Parameters:
        parentSchema - A single parent schema, describing the format of tuples which this worker should expect to receive.

      • getFields

        backtype.storm.tuple.Fields getFields()
        Get the fields schema.
        Returns:
        The current configured schema.

      • setFields

        void setFields(backtype.storm.tuple.Fields fields)
        Set the fields Schema.
        Parameters:
        fields - A schema to set.
